mapper.select: /* product.newProductBid.selectRequestProductDetailInfo*/ SELECT REQPROD.NEWGOODID , REQPROD.STAND_GOOD_NAME , REQPROD.REQUEST_TYPE , REQPROD.STAND_GOOD_SPEC_DESC , REQPROD.NOTE , REQPROD.STATE , REQPROD.INSERT_USER_ID , REQPROD.INSERT_BORGID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, REQPROD.INSERT_DATE , 23) AS INSERT_DATE , REQPROD.SET_USER_ID , REQPROD.SET_DATE , REQPROD.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , GOOD.GOOD_NAME , dbo.FNS_BORG_STRING(REQPROD.INSERT_BORGID) AS BORGNMS , ATT1.attach_seq AS firstattachseq , ATT2.attach_seq AS secondattachseq , ATT3.attach_seq AS thirdattachseq , ATT1.attach_file_name AS firstAttachName , ATT2.attach_file_name AS secondAttachName , ATT3.attach_file_name AS thirdAttachName , ATT1.attach_file_path AS firstAttachPath , ATT2.attach_file_path AS secondAttachPath , ATT3.attach_file_path AS thirdAttachPath FROM MCNEWGOODREQUEST REQPROD WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON REQPROD.FIRSTATTACHSEQ = ATT1.attach_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON REQPROD.SECONDATTACHSEQ = ATT2.attach_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON REQPROD.THIRDATTACHSEQ = ATT3.attach_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN MCGOOD GOOD WITH(NOLOCK) ON REQPROD.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = GOOD.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB WHERE REQPROD.newgoodid = #{newgoodid}
mapper.sql: FROM MCBID WITH(NOLOCK) , SMPUSERS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MCBID.insert_user_id = SMPUSERS.USERID

FROM MCBID WITH(NOLOCK) , SMPUSERS WITH(NOLOCK) , MCBIDAUCTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MCBID.insert_user_id = SMPUSERS.USERID AND MCBID.BIDID = MCBIDAUCTION.BIDID
AND MCBID.BIDID LIKE '%' + #{srcBidid} + '%'
AND MCBID.BIDNAME LIKE '%' + #{srcBidname} + '%'
AND MCBID.BIDSTATE = #{srcBidState}
AND MCBID.STAND_GOOD_NAME LIKE '%' + #{srcStand_good_name} + '%'
AND MCBID.INSERT_DATE >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #{srcInsert_FromDt})
AND MCBID.INSERT_DATE <= CONVERT(DATETIME, #{srcInsert_EndDt})+1
AND MCBID.STAND_GOOD_SPEC_DESC LIKE '%' + #{srcStand_good_spec_desc} + '%'
AND MCBIDAUCTION.VENDORID = #{srcVendorid}
AND MCBID.BID_CLASSIFY = #{bidClassify}
GROUP BY MCBID.BIDID , MCBID.BIDNAME , MCBID.STAND_GOOD_NAME , MCBID.STAND_GOOD_SPEC_DESC , MCBID.BIDSTATE , DBO.FNS_CODENM1BYCODEVAL1('BIDSTATE',MCBID.BIDSTATE) , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), MCBID.BIDENDDATE, 120) , SMPUSERS.USERNM , CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), MCBID.INSERT_DATE, 121) , MCBID.IS_USE_CERTIFICATE , MCBID.INSERT_DATE
, MCBIDAUCTION.VENDORID
, MCBID.BID_CLASSIFY
mapper.select: /* product.newProductBid.selectNewProductBidListCntAdm */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MCBID WITH(NOLOCK) , SMPUSERS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MCBID.insert_user_id = SMPUSERS.USERID
mapper.insert: /* product.newProductBid.insertNewProductRequestHistByNewgoodid*/ INSERT INTO dbo.mcnewgoodrequest_hist ( newgood_hist_id , newgoodid , stand_good_name , stand_good_spec_desc , note , state , insert_user_id , insert_borgid , insert_date , set_user_id , set_date , good_iden_numb , delete_state ) SELECT #{newgood_hist_id} , a.newgoodid , a.stand_good_name , a.stand_good_spec_desc , a.note , a.state , a.insert_user_id , a.insert_borgid , a.insert_date , a.set_user_id , a.set_date , a.good_iden_numb , #{delete_state} FROM mcnewgoodrequest a WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE a.newgoodid = #{newgoodid}

/* product.newProductBid.insertBidHist */ INSERT INTO MCBID_HIST ( BID_HIST_ID , BIDID , BIDNAME , BIDSTATE , STAND_GOOD_NAME , STAND_GOOD_SPEC_DESC , IS_USE_CERTIFICATE , HOPE_SALE_PRICE , BIDNOTE , FIRSTATTACHSEQ , SECONDATTACHSEQ , THIRDATTACHSEQ , BIDENDDATE , NEWGOODID , GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , INSERT_USER_ID , INSERT_DATE ) SELECT #{bid_hist_id} , A.BIDID , A.BIDNAME , A.BIDSTATE , A.STAND_GOOD_NAME , A.STAND_GOOD_SPEC_DESC , A.IS_USE_CERTIFICATE , A.HOPE_SALE_PRICE , A.BIDNOTE , A.FIRSTATTACHSEQ , A.SECONDATTACHSEQ , A.THIRDATTACHSEQ , A.BIDENDDATE , A.NEWGOODID , A.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , A.INSERT_USER_ID , A.INSERT_DATE FROM MCBID A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.BIDID = #{bidid}

/* product.newProductBid.insertBidAuctionHist */ INSERT INTO MCBIDAUCTION_HIST ( BID_HIST_ID , BIDID , VENDORID , VENDORBIDSTATE , GOOD_NAME , GOOD_SPEC_DESC , ORDE_CLAS_CODE , SALE_UNIT_PRICE , DELI_MINI_DAY , DELI_MINI_QUAN , MAKE_COMP_NAME , ORIGINAL_IMG_PATH , LARGE_IMG_PATH , MIDDLE_IMG_PATH , SMALL_IMG_PATH , GOOD_DESC , GOOD_SAME_WORD , FIRSTATTACHSEQ , SECONDATTACHSEQ , THIRDATTACHSEQ , IS_REG_GODD , BIDDING_DATE , BIDDING_USER_ID , CONFIRM_DATE , CONFIRM_USER_ID ) SELECT #{bid_hist_id} , A.BIDID , A.VENDORID , A.VENDORBIDSTATE , A.GOOD_NAME , A.GOOD_SPEC_DESC , A.ORDE_CLAS_CODE , A.SALE_UNIT_PRICE , A.DELI_MINI_DAY , A.DELI_MINI_QUAN , A.MAKE_COMP_NAME , A.ORIGINAL_IMG_PATH , A.LARGE_IMG_PATH , A.MIDDLE_IMG_PATH , A.SMALL_IMG_PATH , A.GOOD_DESC , A.GOOD_SAME_WORD , A.FIRSTATTACHSEQ , A.SECONDATTACHSEQ , A.THIRDATTACHSEQ , A.IS_REG_GODD , A.BIDDING_DATE , A.BIDDING_USER_ID , A.CONFIRM_DATE , A.CONFIRM_USER_ID FROM MCBIDAUCTION A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.BIDID = #{bidid} AND A.VENDORID = #{vendorid}
mapper.select: /* product.newProductBid.selectBidAuctionDetailInfo */ SELECT BIDID , VENDORID , VENDORBIDSTATE , GOOD_SPEC_DESC , ORDE_CLAS_CODE , SALE_UNIT_PRICE , DELI_MINI_DAY , DELI_MINI_QUAN , MAKE_COMP_NAME , ORIGINAL_IMG_PATH , LARGE_IMG_PATH , MIDDLE_IMG_PATH , SMALL_IMG_PATH , GOOD_DESC , GOOD_SAME_WORD , FIRSTATTACHSEQ , SECONDATTACHSEQ , THIRDATTACHSEQ , IS_REG_GODD , BIDDING_DATE , BIDDING_USER_ID , CONFIRM_DATE , CONFIRM_USER_ID FROM MCBIDAUCTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE bidid = #{bidid} AND vendorid = #{vendorid}

/* product.newProductBid.selectBidProductDetailInfo */ SELECT BID.bidid , BID.bidname , BID.bidstate , BID.stand_good_name , BID.stand_good_spec_desc , BID.is_use_certificate , BID.hope_sale_price , BID.bidnote , BID.FIRSTATTACHSEQ , BID.SECONDATTACHSEQ , BID.THIRDATTACHSEQ , BID.bidenddate , BID.newgoodid , BID.good_iden_numb , BID.insert_user_id , BID.insert_date , ATT1.attach_seq AS firstattachseq , ATT2.attach_seq AS secondattachseq , ATT3.attach_seq AS thirdattachseq , ATT1.attach_file_name AS firstAttachName , ATT2.attach_file_name AS secondAttachName , ATT3.attach_file_name AS thirdAttachName , ATT1.attach_file_path AS firstAttachPath , ATT2.attach_file_path AS secondAttachPath , ATT3.attach_file_path AS thirdAttachPath , BID.BID_CLASSIFY FROM MCBID BID WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON BID.FIRSTATTACHSEQ = ATT1.attach_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON BID.SECONDATTACHSEQ = ATT2.attach_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON BID.THIRDATTACHSEQ = ATT3.attach_seq WHERE BID.bidid = #{bidid}

/* product.newProductBid.selectNewProductBidAuctionList */ SELECT BIDAUC.BIDID , BIDAUC.VENDORID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, BIDAUC.BIDDING_DATE , 23) AS BIDDING_DATE , BIDAUC.SALE_UNIT_PRICE , CASE WHEN LEN(BIDAUC.ORIGINAL_IMG_PATH) > 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ISSETIMAGE , CASE WHEN LEN(BIDAUC.GOOD_DESC) > 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ISSETDESC , BIDAUC.IS_REG_GODD , BIDAUC.VENDORBIDSTATE , VEN.VENDORNM , VEN.VENDORCD , VEN.PRESSENTNM , VEN.PHONENUM , BID.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB FROM MCBIDAUCTION BIDAUC WITH(NOLOCK) , SMPVENDORS VEN, MCBID BID WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIDAUC.vendorid = VEN.VENDORID AND BIDAUC.bidid = BID.bidid AND BIDAUC.bidid = #{bidid}
ORDER BY ${orderString}

/* product.newProductBid.selectBidAuctionProductDetailInfo */ SELECT VEN.VENDORNM , BIDAUC.bidid , BIDAUC.vendorid , BIDAUC.vendorbidstate , BIDAUC.good_name , BIDAUC.good_st_spec_desc , BIDAUC.good_spec_desc , BIDAUC.orde_clas_code , BIDAUC.sale_unit_price , BIDAUC.deli_mini_day , BIDAUC.deli_mini_quan , BIDAUC.make_comp_name , BIDAUC.original_img_path , BIDAUC.large_img_path , BIDAUC.middle_img_path , BIDAUC.small_img_path , BIDAUC.good_desc , BIDAUC.good_same_word , BIDAUC.FIRSTATTACHSEQ , BIDAUC.SECONDATTACHSEQ , BIDAUC.THIRDATTACHSEQ , BIDAUC.IS_REG_GODD , CONVERT(VARCHAR, BIDAUC.bidding_date , 23) AS bidding_date , BIDAUC.bidding_user_id , CONVERT(VARCHAR, BIDAUC.confirm_date , 23) AS confirm_date , BIDAUC.confirm_user_id , ATT1.attach_seq AS firstattachseq , ATT2.attach_seq AS secondattachseq , ATT3.attach_seq AS thirdattachseq , ATT1.attach_file_name AS firstAttachName , ATT2.attach_file_name AS secondAttachName , ATT3.attach_file_name AS thirdAttachName , ATT1.attach_file_path AS firstAttachPath , ATT2.attach_file_path AS secondAttachPath , ATT3.attach_file_path AS thirdAttachPath FROM MCBIDAUCTION BIDAUC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON BIDAUC.FIRSTATTACHSEQ = ATT1.attach_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON BIDAUC.SECONDATTACHSEQ = ATT2.attach_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHINFO ATT3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON BIDAUC.THIRDATTACHSEQ = ATT3.attach_seq , SMPVENDORS VEN WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIDAUC.vendorid = VEN.vendorid AND BIDAUC.bidid = #{bidid} AND BIDAUC.vendorid = #{vendorid}

/* product.newProductBid.selectReqAndBidInfo */ SELECT BID.good_iden_numb , ISNULL (BID.good_iden_numb , 0 ) AS bid_good_iden_numb , ISNULL (NEWGOOD.newgoodid , 0 ) AS newgoodid , ISNULL (NEWGOOD.good_iden_numb , 0) AS newgood_good_iden_numb FROM mcbid BID WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN mcnewgoodrequest NEWGOOD WITH(NOLOCK) ON BID.newgoodid = NEWGOOD.newgoodid WHERE BID.bidid = #{bidid} ;
